author: daniellehrner
content:
My only doubt about EIP-5133 is the motivation section:
> Targeting for The Merge to occur mid-September 2022, trying to merge before block times noticeably slow down.

To me this reads like a (semi-) official date for the Mainnet Merge. Is everybody okay with comitting to this?

author: killari.
content: thats how I read it too

author: ericmartihaynes
content: That motivation was based on this section of the summary of the call yesterday: *"The first bit was about how much of a block time increase is acceptable, and whether we should aim for the delay to start kicking in when we expect to be ready to merge, or for blocks to not be exceeding X time. After some back and forth, weâ€™ve converged on the former: trying to Merge before block times noticeably slow down."*

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Agree, I am not ready to commit to this. Imo the EIP should only specify the bomb delay, discussions/opinions about the merge must not be part of this EIP

author: ericmartihaynes
content:
Seems like at some point the "before" got removed. Would everyone be comfortable with:
 "Targeting for The Merge to occur before mid-September 2022"

(similar to EIP-4345 *"Targeting for The Merge to occur before June 2022. If it is not ready by then, the bomb can be delayed further."*)

author: sky.cactus
content: There isn't really a "target" for the merge so much as there is some non-trivial probability that it happens "before mid-September 2022".

author: sky.cactus
content: That probability may be below 50%, all we can really say I think is that it is bigger than epsilon.

author: alexssd7fp
content:
Same as with Dec 2021 pushback:

Targeting for the Shanghai upgrade and/or the Merge to occur before December 2021. Either the bomb can be readjusted at that time, or removed all together.

author: alexssd7fp
content: I think it's better to deliver no promises rather than deliver false promises

author: gcolvin
content:
As <@478178670637219840> discussed here ...
> https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/745077610685661265/985672797198106625
... the chance of a chain split and the technical (and political) problems that could cause are relevant.  And I don't think now is the time to get into those.
